briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Assessment of Diagnostic Microprobe (inPROBE) in Women at High Risk of Breast Cancer (Part I Study)
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multicentre, Single-arm Safety and Efficacy Clinical Investigation of Diagnostic Microprobe (inPROBE) for the Assessment of HER2 Receptor Expression in Population of Women at High Risk of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Preliminary determination of HER2 receptor concentration ranges detected with inPROBE corresponding to HER2 receptor status (positive/negative) as determined by current diagnostic standard (IHC/FISH).
